column1: Master of Science in Sustainable Food Systems (Online)

OurMSc in Sustainable Food Systemsprovides learners with the tools and critical thinking skills to lead Sustainability projects within their business. It requires students to pursue research on an appropriate topic in sustainable food systems, develop a research question or test a hypothesis, apply the appropriate research methodology, integrate research findings, and articulate the key considerations of the specific investigation.
FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
